text: @noschools2020 @msisodia @HRDMinistry @dmgbnagar @ChangeOrg_India We are not ready to send our kids to school till this covid19 is over. Continue with online education we don't mind atleast our kids are safe in home. From schools its spreading at a faster rate see the school cases rise in Australia same mistake Australia government has done.
